      • costSumForRowset

        public double costSumForRowset​(IntegerSet rowset)
        Returns the sum of costs for a given set of rows given as a IntegerSet. For each row, the minumum cost is chosen.
        Parameters:
        rowset - set of rows for which to find sum of minimums of costs.
        Returns:
        double

      • costSumForRowset

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        double

      • allocateColumnsToRows

        public int[] allocateColumnsToRows​(int[] rowset)
        Find the minumum cost for each column given a set of rows. Purpose: Allocate demand locations (=columns in the matrix) to possible facility locations given a specific solution (= a set of row indices).
        Parameters:
        rowset - Rows to find columns for.
        Returns:
        For each column, the index of row it's allocated to.
